title: New: Yuuca – Breathe
content:
This debut cut from Brisbane quintet Yuuca shows tremendous potential; part London Grammar intricate beauty, part post-rock inspired sing-along.

With a host of awesome visuals on their Facebook page, and only one track to their name so far, it’s clear that everything is extremely carefully considered, ultimately making Yuuca an outfit to definitely keep an eye on. Check out Breathe below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
